Your bit rate/file size choice, complete package is impeccable.  +1 green skull

As story unfold in front of your eyes, Platoon is simply the very best. One of the Masterpiece about Viet Nam war in time. It is almost perfect except about Henry Kissinger betrayed its strategic allies from South Vietnamese, Cambodia, and Laos for new friends from Beijing, China. 
April 30, 1975, 39 years ago, more than 6 million of people died and continue to suffer in the hands of Communist and Red China after the war for many years to come. Their crime: associated and became a "dogs" for Americans. The world chose to forget and looked other ways.
